product_name: The North Face Oso Hoodie - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Oso hoodie combines the performance and style of the epic Denali jacket with a hood for the perfect blend of style and comfort. Incredibly soft polyester fleece is quick-drying and resists pilling, and it keeps her warm without weighing her down. Reinforced shoulder panels repel light precipitation; tricot-lined pockets warm chilly hands. Elastic binding at cuffs, hood and hand pockets; partial elastic hem fits snugly around waist for moisture protection.
short_description: The North Face Oso hoodie combines the performance and style of the epic Denali jacket with a hood for the perfect blend of style and comfort.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
